headline: Simply Good Foods (SMPL) Is Up 13.6% After Q1 Beat And Bigger Buyback Plan - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: In early January 2026, The Simply Good Foods Company reported fiscal first‑quarter 2026 results with net sales of US$340.2 million, lower net income of US$25.27 million, and reaffirmed full‑year guidance for net sales to be between a 2% decline and 2% growth year over year. Alongside this, the company completed a long‑running repurchase of 11.42% of its shares for US$275.96 million and expanded its buyback authorization to US$500 million, while Quest and OWYN brands continued to grow and new...
